009
010package imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterScalar;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.mask.CircularMask;
017import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
018import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
019
020/**
021 * <p>
022 * Ordinary (scalar) median filter for color images implemented by extending the {@link GenericFilter} class. Color
023 * images are filtered individually in all channels. See Sec. 15.2.1 of [1] for details.
024 * </p>
025 * <p>
026 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
027 * (2022).
028 * </p>
029 *
030 * @author WB
031 * @version 2020/12/31
032 */
033public class ScalarMedianFilter extends GenericFilterScalar {
034        
035        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<ScalarMedianFilter> {
036                /** Filter radius */
037                public double radius = 3.0;
038        }
039        
040        private final CircularMask mask;
041        private final int maskCount;
042        private final int xc, yc;
043        private final byte[][] maskArray;
044        private final float[] supportRegion;
045        private final int medianIndex;
046        
047        public ScalarMedianFilter() {
048                this(new Parameters());
049        }
050        
051        public ScalarMedianFilter(Parameters params) {
052                this.mask = new CircularMask(params.radius);
053                this.maskCount = mask.getElementCount();
054                this.xc = mask.getCenterX();
055                this.yc = mask.getCenterY();
056                this.maskArray = mask.getByteArray();
057                this.supportRegion = new float[maskCount];
058                this.medianIndex = maskCount/2;
059        }
060
061        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062        
063        @Override
064        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
065                int k = 0;
066                for (int i = 0; i < maskArray.length; i++) {
067                        int ui = u + i - xc;
068                        for (int j = 0; j < maskArray[0].length; j++) {
069                                if (maskArray[i][j] != 0) {
070                                        int vj = v + j - yc;
071                                        supportRegion[k] = plane.getVal(ui, vj);
072                                        k = k + 1;
073                                }
074                        }
075                }
076                Arrays.sort(supportRegion);
077                return supportRegion[medianIndex];
078        }
079}
